channel.title: Homes on Kevin Webber
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kevin Webber

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Kevin Webber is an analyst, architect, developer, and technical speaker from Toronto, Canada. He has presented at conferences around the world, from Gartner AADI to GeeCON. He specializes in systems modernization, microservices, stream processing, and developer productivity.

Kevin is currently the global Enterprise Advocate for Lightbend (formerly Typesafe), the corporate entity behind the Scala programming language, Akka distributed systems framework, Play! MVC framework, and Lagom microservices framework. In this role Kevin works as an analyst and advisor to major enterprises - commonly referred to as the Global 2000 by Forbes - on systems modernization projects. His passion for the craft of architecture, dedication to developer happiness, and attention to detail have helped major corporations around the world achieve significant business upside.
